description: Handmade using 14 different yarns composed of wool, linen, and mulberry silk. Inspired by vintage blankets and traditional Southwestern patterns. Variegated novelty stitches at the collar and placket. Genuine horn buttons.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 26" body length, a 17.5" shoulder, a 42" chest, and a 25" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes 0.5" between sizes.
Shawl collar with a two-button closure at the right side. Five-button placket. Genuine horn buttons.
54% wool, 29% linen, 13% mulberry silk, 4% other fibers.
